de.iabg.mode.event
Class UpperToleranceChangeListener

java.lang.Object
  de.iabg.mode.event.UpperToleranceChangeListener
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.util.EventListener, javax.swing.event.ChangeListener
public class UpperToleranceChangeListener
extends java.lang.Object
implements javax.swing.event.ChangeListener

This ChangeListener updates the upper color tolerance of the JModeCorrelationPanel whenever the target changes. If the upper color tolerance is less than the lower color tolerance, the upper color tolerance is set to the same value as the lower color tolerance.

Version:
September 13, 2008
Author:
Adam C. Dick, BSE
